parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID as defined by swCommands_e

parameters.name: TargetToolbar
parameters.description: Toolbar as defined by swToolbar_e or if a CommandGroup toolbar, use ICommandGroup::ToolbarId

parameters.name: TargetIndex
parameters.description: 0-based index of the toolbar button on the native SOLIDWORKS toolbar or CommandGroup toolbar

title: ISldWorks.DragToolbarButtonFromCommandID
description: Copies a button to a toolbar using a command ID.
signature:
System.Int32 DragToolbarButtonFromCommandID( 
   System.Int32
CommandID
,
   System.Int32
TargetToolbar
,
   System.Int32
TargetIndex
)

parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID as defined by swCommands_e

parameters.name: TargetToolbar
parameters.description: Toolbar as defined by swToolbar_e or if a CommandGroup toolbar, use ICommandGroup::ToolbarId

parameters.name: TargetIndex
parameters.description: 0-based index of the toolbar button on the native SOLIDWORKS toolbar or CommandGroup toolbar

returns: Index of the toolbar or -1 if the button is not added
